title: messed up my hextech crafting
body: I accidentally disenchanted a champion shard that I wanted to upgrade to permanent. Is there ANY way to get this shard back so I can upgrade it. I don't think there is a way without submitting a ticket and I'm not sure if that would help me either. plz halp

replies.body: Dont upgrade champion shard, they cost too much blue essence. You better save some IP and buy it that way imo

I can't make any promises, but we *may* be able to help if you write in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Like I said, no guarantees, but this is the best course of action at the moment.
